316a2(nyi khri): shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig
316a3(nyi khri): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos/ skal pa
316a4(nyi khri): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim gror byas/ bkur bstir dbyas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor
316a5(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
316a6(nyi khri): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ni tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o// bco
316a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la/ gzugasu mchis su lags na ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar mi 'gyur ro// 
316a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor leg so leg so// de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
316b1(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongasu bsngo bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ 
316b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ce/ 
316b3(nyi khri): bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor chags pa med pa'i yongasu bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang
316b4(nyi khri): nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi zha 'i na dbye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs
316b5(nyi khri): dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 
316b6(nyi khri): ldan par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag
316b7(nyi khri): ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can no// de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
316b8(nyi khri): bcom par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos
317a1(nyi khri): rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ bsti stang du byed/ mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmigs pa'i 'du shes can no// de nas
317a2(nyi khri): rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang / 'grogs te thal mo sbyar nas/ dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di
317a3(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
317a4(nyi khri): chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis bi 'u tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
317a5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems
317a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba shin tu che'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang / 'grogs te/ lha
317a7(nyi khri): rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo
317a8(nyi khri): byed cing lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan
317b1(nyi khri): 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmigasum ma/ 
317b2(nyi khri): ba'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo zhing // 
317b3(nyi khri): ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yong su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs
317b4(nyi khri): su bsngo ba shin tu che'o// de nas lha'i bu rab 'tshe ma dang / darab dga' ldan dang / rab dga' 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyang lha'i bu stong phrag
317b5(nyi khri): du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bzla/ dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan
317b6(nyi khri): mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha
317b7(nyi khri): rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad du tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
317b8(nyi khri): mkhas pas dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
318a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de ni khyad/ 
318a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba shin tu che'o// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der
318a3(nyi khri): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
318a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung / da ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa/ dmigs pa'i
318a5(nyi khri): spyod pa can/ de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan ba ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do// tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun
318a6(nyi khri): 'khor dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / che ba dang / chung che ba dang / dge ba dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba
318a7(nyi khri): dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
318a8(nyi khri): te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
318b1(nyi khri): kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dag par spyad pa can de dag ga dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sbyar
318b2(nyi khri): bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
318b3(nyi khri): dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/ 
318b4(nyi khri): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / 
318b5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
318b6(nyi khri): rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
318b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gta/ 
318b8(nyi khri): nam/ shes rab bam/ tshul khrims kyi phung po 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'am/ shes ra'i phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
319a1(nyi khri): ba'i phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rjes su yi rang bar byas la/ de ltar rje su yi
319a2(nyi khri): rang nas kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
319a3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de
319a4(nyi khri): dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
319a5(nyi khri): phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos
319a6(nyi khri): tshad med pa'i bar de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ dmigasu med pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang // mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / 
319a7(nyi khri): byed pa med pa'i tshul du rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med
319a8(nyi khri): pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / ma nyaM 'i rje yi rjes su yi rang ba dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
319b1(nyi khri): dag chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am
319b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du yang mi
319b3(nyi khri): bzod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmig su med pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar zhes
319b4(nyi khri): bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
319b5(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzungs ste rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rje su mi rang
319b6(nyi khri): ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjesu yi rang bar byed do zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam gyis na rje su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ ji tsam gyis na rje su yi rang ba
319b7(nyi khri): mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
319b8(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len mi gtong
320a1(nyi khri): pa dang / mi rlom mi 'dzum zhing dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin la/ de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med/ nyon mongs par gyur pa yang med// 
320a2(nyi khri): rnam par byang bar gyur pa yang med de/ chos de dag la 'grib pa yang med/ 'phel ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ phung por gyur pa yang med do zhes rnam grangs de lta bus/ 'das pa
320a3(nyi khri): dang ta ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med/ 
320a4(nyi khri): pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// / rje su yi rang nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bo zhes de ltar yongasu bsngo ba'i byang
320a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni dam par 'gyur te/ rjes su yi rang ba de dgani mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rab 'byer/ 
320a6(nyi khri): rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni/ de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi bzod de// rje su yi rang ba 'di ni de ma yin
320a7(nyi khri): pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas/ rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// bul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes
320a8(nyi khri): bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// ma mnyam dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
320b1(nyi khri): dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed
320b2(nyi khri): pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
320b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar dang / sems can thams cad
320b4(nyi khri): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rje su yi rang bar bya'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs so// rnam par
320b5(nyi khri): grol ba ji de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba/ ji lta ba de lta bu ni skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams so// / 
320b6(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ tshul khrin
320b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par
320b8(nyi khri): grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// rnam par
321a1(nyi khri): grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamaso// 
321a2(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang // 
321a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stog/ 
321a4(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig bu bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rnam par grol ba'i
321a5(nyi khri): ye shes mthong ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o// / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni mos pa'o// rnam
321a6(nyi khri): par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rje su yi rang ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de
321a7(nyi khri): lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba
321a8(nyi khri): de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams dang / nyan thos de dag gi yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rang sangs rgyas
321b1(nyi khri): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid do// rnam par grol
321b2(nyi khri): ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos nyid do// rnam par grol ba ji lta gsas ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// zhes de ltar chos ma chags pa dang / ma
321b3(nyi khri): bcings pa dang / ma grol ba dang / ma zhen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos ma skyes pa dang / yongasu ma skyes pa dang / ma byung/ 
321b4(nyi khri): ba dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ da' pho ba med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa nye bar bzungs ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
321b5(nyi khri): yongasu bsngo ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dang / ba sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rje su yi rang ba'i rab bo// rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar ro/ 
321b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba de dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
321b7(nyi khri): rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig
321b8(nyi khri): bzhugs pa dang / 'tshe zhing chos ston pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
322a1(nyi khri): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tshe sbyong ni chos sbyin pa di
322a2(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
322a3(nyi khri): bu mo la la zhig gis/ nam 'tsho'i bar du/ nam bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang // gzims cha dang / bsnyun gyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po dang / bde ba'i yo byad mang po thams cad kyis rim
322a4(nyi khri): gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / de dag gi ring bsre
322a5(nyi khri): la nyin mtshan du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir
322a6(nyi khri): bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing // de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom
322a7(nyi khri): pa dang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom
322a8(nyi khri): pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi spyod pa dang / 
322b1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
322b2(nyi khri): ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba
322b3(nyi khri): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma bas/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro bo// rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// yongasu bsngo ba de nyid
322b4(nyi khri): rab ces bya'o// gong na med pa'i bar zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
322b5(nyi khri): spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
322b6(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha
322b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ yongasu bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// / 
322b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os
323a1(nyi khri): pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyis sa
323a2(nyi khri): gos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba la rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
323a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi nang na/ mchog tu bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang
323a4(nyi khri): 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu byang ba'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sems can tha~Md kyi mig lnga yongasu 'thob par bgyid pa la snang
323a5(nyi khri): bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na ba ni sems can thams cad shul gol bar zhugs pa/ rnams mtha' las zlog pa'i slad du shul bstan pa'o// 
323a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
323a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bskyed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong
323a8(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi slad du/ ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtag mi 'jigs pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi ba
323b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad spobs pa'i slad du/ sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa ma
323b2(nyi khri): mchis pa'i slad du/ stobs bcu bgyid pa'o// bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gro ba dang / ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su rgyud gsum du 'khor
323b3(nyi khri): ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o// 
323b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas/ ji ltar shes
323b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bco ldan 'ad/ sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ston pa la ji lta/ ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par
323b6(nyi khri): bya'o// ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba ji ltar de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa yang
323b7(nyi khri): gzhan ma yin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
323b8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
324a1(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'byung ngo // de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
324a2(nyi khri): 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'byung ngo // bsam gtan bzhi dang // tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang // 
324a3(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
324a4(nyi khri): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang // 
324a5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
324a6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam/ 
324a7(nyi khri): dang / tingange 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs kyi chos ma
324a8(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du
324b1(nyi khri): gyur te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu zhu ba 'di gang las skyes/ ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi
324b2(nyi khri): ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba rnams ni thabs mkhas pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
324b3(nyi khri): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang // 
324b4(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gci dag tu bsdus te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong/ 
324b5(nyi khri): su bsngo bas na/ bdag gi zhu ba skyes so// kau shi ka byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rgya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
324b6(nyi khri): pa zil gyis gnon to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gno// / 
324b7(nyi khri): to/ ko shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong yang rung ste/ dmigs bu med par lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/ grong khyer du 'gro bar lta ga la nus/ 
324b8(nyi khri): shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ dmus long lta bur gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na/ de dag la dmigs bu med pas byang chub kyi lam yang
325a1(nyi khri): bskyed par mi nus na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug par lta ga la nus/ kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin
325a2(nyi khri): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mig dang ldan par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po// de nas lha
325a3(nyi khri): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gang 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol
325a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pas yongasu bzungs na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob dpo zhes smras na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni der yang / dam zad de/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol/ 
325a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pas yongasu bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'gro/ bam/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // 
325a6(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bam/ smras pa de lta ma yin te/ kau shi ka de ni de lta ma
325a7(nyi khri): yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa
325a8(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu
325b1(nyi khri): bzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob ste/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// 
325b2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
325b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// kau shi ka de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
325b4(nyi khri): po 'di dag gi rab ces bya'o// gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang // phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dra
325b5(nyi khri): ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji ltar mngon par thams cad du bsgrub par
325b6(nyi khri): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par thaMd
325b7(nyi khri): du bsgrub par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par thad du bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon pa
325b8(nyi khri): thams cad du bsgrub par bya'o// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams mngon par thams cad du bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
326a1(nyi khri): mngon par thams cad du bsgrub par bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par thams cad bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par thad du bsgrub
326a2(nyi khri): par bya'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par thams cad du bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
326a3(nyi khri): thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid mngon par thams cad du bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par thams cad du bsgrub par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
326a4(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyirashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
326a5(nyi khri): mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdo sde bsgrub par bya'o// 'phags pa'i ba na pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
326a6(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
326a7(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so snga
326a8(nyi khri): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// zad shes pa nyid / 
326b1(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du chos thad
326b2(nyi khri): par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes/ 
326b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi
326b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs skye ba med pa dang / gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs dmigs pa
326b5(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs 'jig pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par 'du mngon par 'du bya
326b6(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das
326b7(nyi khri): de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi pha
326b8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang thob par mi byed de/ nam yang chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangasu 'gro'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
327a1(nyi khri): thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba'i tshe rnams thob par mi byed do// dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed// 
327a2(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang / bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus/ 
327a3(nyi khri): ma byas kyi chos rnams thob par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gi phyir yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar mi gnas te/ de'i phyir chos gang yang
327a4(nyi khri): thob par byed pa ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ 
327a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka gang de skad du ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
327a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dam zhes zer ba ni kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed/ dam/ 
327a7(nyi khri): bapar mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid/ dmigs par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom
327a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thob par mi byed pa yin no// / 
327b1(nyi khri): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par gyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa dang / mi len pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / mi 'dor ba dang / 
327b2(nyi khri): mngon par chags pa med par de ltar thob par byed de/ gang yang thob par byed pa med do// kau shi ka de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi byed de gang yang thob
327b3(nyi khri): bar mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma
327b4(nyi khri): mchis pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jigs pa ma/ mchi'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar che'o// de nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
327b5(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos thaMd thob
327b6(nyi khri): par bgyid pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa'o zhes/ de lta bu'i 'du shes gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes
327b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dor ba lag so// bcom ldan 'a das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ring du bgyid pa lag so// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal
327b8(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa de lta bu'i
328a1(nyi khri): rnam grangs yod de/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob bo// 
328a2(nyi khri): kye ma shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsog go// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying po med pa'o// snyam du de ltar 'du she na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
328a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa'o// rab 'byor de ni rnam grangs gang gis byang chub
328a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dang / sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed/ 
328a5(nyi khri): ba'i rnam grang so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ chos gang la yid ches par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra/ 
328a6(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yid ches
328a7(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro// mig pa ya di ches par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// sgra dang
328a8(nyi khri): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// mig gi rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes
328b1(nyi khri): pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyuraro// mig 'dus te reg pa 'i lji che par mi 'gyur/  ba'i 'dus te ga pa dang / sna'i du teg dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
328b2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / 
328b3(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
328b4(nyi khri): ba la yod ches par mi 'gyur ro// sa'i khams la yid ches pa ra mi 'gyur ro// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams/ 
328b5(nyi khri): la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// ma rig pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang // 
328b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
328b7(nyi khri): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par mi 'gyuraro// 
328b8(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches
329a1(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med
329a2(nyi khri): ba bzhi dang / gzug med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
329a3(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
329a4(nyi khri): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs dpa'i 'bras bu la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// lan cig
329a5(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur/ ro// rang byang chub la yid ches par mi 'gyuraro// lam
329a6(nyi khri): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyuraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi// 
329a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
329a8(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor gzugasu/ mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
329b1(nyi khri): ba la yid ches par 'gyur te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yid che/ 
329b2(nyi khri): bar mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// / 
329b3(nyi khri): rgyu gang gis na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyi/ 
329b4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ skye mched dang / khan das dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba che bar mi bgyid// 
329b5(nyi khri): chung bar mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi ba gyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
329b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ nang stong pa nyid che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid// 
329b7(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun che bar mi bgyid
329b8(nyi khri): chung bar mi bgyid/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
330a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / 
330a2(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar
330a3(nyi khri): mi bgyid/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub che bar mi
330a4(nyi khri): bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes
330a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs/ bar mi bgyid/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'du bar mi bgyid/ yang bar mi bgyid/ byang
330a6(nyi khri): chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchi/ 
330a7(nyi khri): par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs rgya chen// 
330a8(nyi khri): por mi bgyid// rgya chung ngu mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rgya chen por mi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
330b1(nyi khri): 'di ni/ gzugs mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sam dag dus kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid de/ 
330b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// bco ldan 'das
330b3(nyi khri): gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
330b4(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha ho la tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs che bar mi bgyid/ chu/ 
330b5(nyi khri): bar mi bgyid do// byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas/ kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ gzugs mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu med pa
330b6(nyi khri): mi bgyid do// byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu med par mi bgyid do zhes bgyi bar 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
330b7(nyi khri): de ltar/ 'du shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung
330b8(nyi khri): bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar
331a1(nyi khri): bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang gzugs mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du bgyid pa 'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni
331a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ mthu ma mchis
331a3(nyi khri): par bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs che bar bgyid pa'am/ 
331a4(nyi khri): chung bar bgyid pa 'am/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bur bgyid pa'am/ gang gzugs mthu dang ldan par bgyi
331a5(nyi khri): pa'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa'am/ byang chub dang / sang / sa rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu/ dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa
331a6(nyi khri): de ni/ de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la/ byang chub ces bgyi ba ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar sems can skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab
331a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par lta'o// gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin skye ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par
331a8(nyi khri): lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sang+yas dang rgyad kyi chos rnams kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
331b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par lta'o// sems can rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par lta'o// gzugs rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i
331b2(nyi khri): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang // 
331b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par lta'o// seni dngos po ma mchis
331b4(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchi das par lta'o// gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchi// 
331b5(nyi khri): par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
331b6(nyi khri): du dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par lta'o// sems can stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid / 
331b7(nyi khri): du lta'o// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / 
331b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du lta'o// sems can dben pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
332a1(nyi khri): ba dben par lta'o// gzugs dben pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / 
332a2(nyi khri): byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du dben pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par lta'o// sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
332a3(nyi khri): pa ma mchis par lta'o// gzugs ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub
332a4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchi nges pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis dpar lta'o// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes
332a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par lta'o// gzug sa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du she
332a6(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
332a7(nyi khri): phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par lta'o// sems can rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par lta'o// gzugs rnam par 'jig
332a8(nyi khri): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang
332b1(nyi khri): byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par lta'o// sems
332b2(nyi khri): can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par lta'o// gzugs mngon par rdzogs par rgya
332b3(nyi khri): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ma mchis par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par
332b4(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du/ mngon par rdzog rnas par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha
332b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par lta'o// sems can gyi stobs yongasasu 'grub pa ma ma chis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yong
332b6(nyi khri): su 'grub pa ma mchis par lta'o// gzugs kyi stobs yongasasu 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yong su 'grub pa ma mchis par lta'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
332b7(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stobs yongasasu 'grub pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stobs yong su 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i
332b8(nyi khri): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongasu 'grub pa ma mchis par lta'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des kyang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub
333a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu lnga pa'o// / 
333a2(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
333a3(nyi khri): la mos par gyur pa de dag gang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir mchis pa lags/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ji snyed cig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs
333a4(nyi khri): pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
333a5(nyi khri): don dang / tshul gyis mos par gyur pa de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni yun ring po ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
333a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni yun rung po ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags/ bcom ldan
333a7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
333a8(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa'i bsnyen bkur nas/ 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skye ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ skal pa bye ba khrag khrig
333b1(nyi khri): brgya stong grangs med tshad med dpag tu med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par shes par bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
333b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par shes par bya'o// de ni skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pan
333b3(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ de sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dir 'ongs pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
333b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin da ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dir 'ong
333b5(nyi khri): so des de nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med de bag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ 
333b6(nyi khri): bsnyen bkur nas/ 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthong ngam/ thos na/ bdag gis
333b7(nyi khri): ston pa mthong ngo zhes bya bar sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// bdag gis ston pa tho so zhes bya bar sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 
333b8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mi gnyis pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul du don dang / tshul gyi rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
334a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa 'am/ blta bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor shes
334a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni nyan pa med do// lta ba med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi nyan/ mi blta'o// chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de dag gis
334a3(nyi khri): mi thos mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
334a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag/ gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // ches la sems med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // / 
334a5(nyi khri): chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
334a6(nyi khri): rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang
334a7(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
334a8(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
334b1(nyi khri): mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
334b2(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de dag gis mi tho mi/ 
334b3(nyi khri): mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ 
334b4(nyi khri): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni de dag gri mi zos mi mthong ngo // chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ lam gyi rnam pa shre/ 
334b5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ni de dag gis mi zos mi mthong ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// 
334b6(nyi khri): bam po so brgyad pa// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de yun ring po ji snyed
334b7(nyi khri): gcig nas spyod spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni rnam par phye zhing bshad dgos pa te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la/ 
334b8(nyi khri): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson par byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
335a1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed cing / 'phel
335a2(nyi khri): ba dang / 'grib par mthong ba med pas/ chos gang yang mi spong te/ nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang 'bral bar mi
335a3(nyi khri): 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gro dang / bkur bsti nga/ bsti stang dang / mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa'i dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / 
335a4(nyi khri): sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye la/ nam yang mngon par shes pa
335a5(nyi khri): rnams dang mi 'bral zhing / nyon mongs pa gang dang yang mi 'a grogs la/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / lhan cig mi gnas shing / sems can yongasu
335a6(nyi khri): smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba de lta bu'i rnam grangs yod de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
335a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de lta bu dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'o// 
335a8(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po mthong zhing / de dag gi drung du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
335b1(nyi khri): sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan bskyed pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa yod de/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
335b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du 'dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me/ 
335b3(nyi khri): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rim gror med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung na gung du 'ong ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
335b4(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bston pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du 'dod 'dong ba ste/ de dag ni da ltar byung ba'i tshe yang
335b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du 'dong bar 'gyur te/ lus dang sems kyis 'thun par spyod par mi 'gyur ro// de dag gi ni shes rab
335b6(nyi khri): 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing sogs pa yin te/ de dag shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ spong
335b7(nyi khri): bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad ma/ 
335b8(nyi khri): pa nyid spangs par 'gyur te/ de dag rnam pa zad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas shing / bsags pa dang / chos brlag par 'gyur ba'i las byas shings she
336a1(nyi khri): / kho po dag / yo rgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal bar bsreg par 'gyur ro// de dag sems can/ 
336a2(nyi khri): dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong ba'i tshe/ mes yongasu 'jig
336a3(nyi khri): pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar mes yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig
336a4(nyi khri): ba 'byung ba'i tshe yang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyurate/ de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de dag tu bsreg par 'gyur ro// 
336a5(nyi khri): der 'phangs te der skyes nas kyang / sems can dmyal ba/ chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'de/ bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can
336a6(nyi khri): dmyal ba chen por 'dong ba de'i tshe/ mes yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa 'byung ste/ de dag de ltar mes yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig
336a7(nyi khri): pa'am/ rlung gis yengasu 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang 'jig rten gyi khrag dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur te/ de dag tu bsreg par 'gyur ro// der 'phangs te/ 
336a8(nyi khri): der skyes nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dod
336b1(nyi khri): ba'i che/ mes yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa 'byung ste/ de dag de ltar mes yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis
336b2(nyi khri): yongasu 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang / shar phyogs kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub
336b3(nyi khri): byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyuraro// de dag tu yang seMn dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur
336b4(nyi khri): te/ der yang mes yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jog dpa'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa 'byung ste/ de dag / de ltar mes yongasu 'jig pa'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa'o// 
336b5(nyi khri): rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ de nas shi 'phos chus 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las de ma zad par yang 'dir skyes te/ de dag tu yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can
336b6(nyi khri): dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur ro// de dag der skyes nas kyang / sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyam su 'bab par 'gyur ro// de dag tu yang mes yos
336b7(nyi khri): su 'jig pa 'am/ chus yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa byung gi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag mes yongasu 'jig pa'am/ 
336b8(nyi khri): chus yongasu 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongasu 'jig pa byung nas kyang / de dag nas shi 'phos te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu/ byol song gi skye gnas pa rnams dang / skal pa
337a1(nyi khri): mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag
337a2(nyi khri): tu byol song gi skye gnas rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag yang phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag
337a3(nyi khri): der skyes nas sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad nas/ ci ste brgya la mir skye ba thob na yang / chus 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / bsgrubs pa
337a4(nyi khri): dang / tshang ba dang / rdzogs pa'i rnam par smin pa des/ de dag dgang dang gang du skye ba de dang der dmus long gi rig/ su skye bar 'gyur/ phyag dar ba'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur gdol
337a5(nyi khri): pa'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigasu skye bar 'gyur/ de dag der skyes nas kyang / dmus long du 'gyur/ ba yin// zhar bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna ba med par 'gyur ba yin/ 
337a6(nyi khri): lce med par 'gyur ba yin/ lag pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ rkang pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dza can du 'gyur ba yin/ sha bkra can du 'gyur ba yin/ sgur por 'gyur ba yin/ gang na sangs/ 
337a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sgra med pa dang / chos kyi sgra med pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra med pa de dag tu/ rtag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad/ 
337a8(nyi khri): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lngas ni/ chos 'jig par 'gyur 'i dug las bgyis pa dang / bsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan tsam du yang ma spyod do// 
337b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ltan cing shad pa'i che/ phyir spang bar sems shing 'di skad du/ 'di la khyed dang
337b2(nyi khri): bdag cag gis bslab par mi byed te/ 'di ni chos ma yin no// 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin no// 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
337b3(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no// zhes zer zhing / de bdag nyid kyang phyir spong la/ sems can gzhan yang mos pa med par byed cing / bdag gi bsam pa nyams par byas nas/ gzhan gyi
337b4(nyi khri): bsam pa nyams par byed pa/ bdag gi bsam pa gdug par byas nas/ gzhan gyi bsam pa gdug par bya bar dga' / bdag nyid chud gson cing / gzhan chud gson par dga'
337b5(nyi khri): pa/ bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo mi shes mi rig pas/ phyir spang bar 'dod la/ gzhan yang de bzhin du 'dzin du 'jug pa de'i chos 'jig par dga' ba'i
337b6(nyi khri): las byas shing bsags pa lta la/ des gzugs brnyan du yang 'gyur re skan/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni gang zag de lta bu thos par bya bar yang ma gnang na/ phrad pa lta ci smos te/ 'grogs par lta
337b7(nyi khri): mos kyang ci smos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni/ chos la skyon 'dogs par rig par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang zag de lta bu ni blun po'i tshul can phyogs nag po'i
337b8(nyi khri): tshul can du rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag gi ngag mnyan par sems pa 'am/ de dag la yid ches par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang / tshul ma yin pa'i 'jig pas phung bar
338a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ shA radwa ti'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngon 'dogs pa de ni/ chos la skyon 'dogs par rig par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
338a2(nyi khri): ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad da dungam gsung so// bcom ldan 'das kyis / 
338a3(nyi khri): sbal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu ches la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ni ma gleng shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag chos la skyon 'degs pa de'i lus kyi tshad thos na/ mod la
338a4(nyi khri): tu sdug par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal lam mya ngan gyi zug rngu skye ba'am/ ldum bu dbarngas pa ltar skam zhing rnyis par 'gyur du 'ong ste/ gang zag
338a5(nyi khri): der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ni thos na yang nyes pa de lta bu yod pa de tsam ste/ de'i lus kyi tshad ni de yin no zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la skabs
338a6(nyi khri): dbye ba ma mdzad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa des/ chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag lus 'di 'dra
338a7(nyi khri): ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bas ni/ ma byung ba'i skye bo rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni chos 'jig par 'gyur
338a8(nyi khri): ba'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / tshang bar byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskang ba des/ 'di srid cig tu sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal
338b1(nyi khri): myong bar 'gyur ro// 'di srid gcig tu byol song gi skye gnas kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'di srid cig tu gshin rje'i 'jig rten du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// zhes byas pa de nyid kyis
338b2(nyi khri): kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de legs so// bde bar gshegs pa de leg so// bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyang dkar zhing rigs
338b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams nongs pa spong zhing bdag cag gis de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes/ srog gi don du yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ngo // de nas tshe
338b4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ gang zug dam pI tshe spong ba'i nod pa brjod pa 'di thos na/ bdag cag kyang
338b5(nyi khri): ngan song dag tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu myong du'o// ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ba dang / chos mi / thos pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen cing bkur du med par gyur
338b6(nyi khri): du 'ong ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes su 'ong ngo // mi phongs par gyur du 'ong ngo // shin tu 'jungs pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes bgyi bar lus dang
338b7(nyi khri): ngag dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsdam par bgyi'o// yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs tshig gi las bgyis shing bsags pas ni/ chos
338b8(nyi khri): 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las bgyis shing bsags par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor tshig gi las byas shing bsags pas// chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i
339a1(nyi khri): las byas shing bsags par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyon du 'dogs par sems shing / phyir spang bar sems dpa' de
339a2(nyi khri): dag kyang chos dang 'dul ba de nyid la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ sangs rgyas bcos rnams kyi byang chub la
339a3(nyi khri): skyon btags shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byin pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das rnams
339a4(nyi khri): kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skyon gtags shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skyon btags shing byir spangs pas// chos la smon btags
339a5(nyi khri): shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// chos phyir spangs pas/ dge 'dun phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun phyir spangs pas 'dzi/ nyin pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba phyir spangs par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten
339a6(nyi khri): pa'i yang dag par lta ba phyir spangs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
339a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// ngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi/ 
339a8(nyi khri): bar du phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du phyir spangs par 'gyura'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / 
339b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
339b2(nyi khri): bar 'jug pa gung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / 
339b3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyir spangs par 'gyur ro// thams
339b4(nyi khri): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir spangs par 'gyu na ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir spangs pas// 
339b5(nyi khri): bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa
339b6(nyi khri): yongasu bzung bas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas kyi nang du sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa myong bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis
339b7(nyi khri): gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das skye bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di slar spong ba de dag rnam pa du zhig gis/ shes rab kyi phyin pa zab mo 'di slar spong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'dra
339b8(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag rnam pa bzhis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bzhi gang dang gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dka'
340a1(nyi khri): stsal pa/ skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong ba de dag ni/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ rab 'byor rgyu dang po des na/ shes rab kyi
340a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// chos zab mo rnams la yid ma ches pa dang / dad cing mos pa med pa yin te/ rgyu gnyis pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
340a3(nyi khri): mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag du song ba yin te/ brtson 'grus med cing / phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas/ rgyu gsum pa
340a4(nyi khri): des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni zhe sdang gi skye dad pa can yin te/ de dag bdag stod cing gzhan smod par 'gyur
340a5(nyi khri): ba yin pas/ rgyu bzhi pa des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam ba bzhi po de dag gis skyes bu glen pa de dag shes rab kyi pha
340a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir spong bar 'gyur ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi ldan zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug
340a7(nyi khri): par mchis pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o// bac+doMldas kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni brtson 'grus chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi ldan zhing / sdig pa'i/ 
340a8(nyi khri): grogs pa'i lag du lhung ba rnams kyis mos par dka'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar mos par dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
340b1(nyi khri): ga rab 'byor gzugs ni ma cings grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la rang bzhin med pa ni gzug so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma
340b2(nyi khri): grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma
340b3(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
340b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ rab ni ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
340b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la rang
